EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: See you Thursday 1/29 for the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop coming up next Thursday in Tampa. We look forward to seeing you!
Please bring your wifi-enabled laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands-on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop prior to attending following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop Thursday, January 29, 2015 8:00am - 4:00pm (breakfast & lunch provided) Workshop Agenda <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/tampa>
LOCATION Renaissance Tampa International Plaza Hotel Livorno Room 4200 Jim Walter Blvd. Tampa, FL 33607 USA Map and Driving Directions
PARKING Complimentary self-parking is available at the workshop venue. Valet parking is available for $5 per day or $20 overnight.
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands-on Sections
- Git <http://git-scm.com/downloads> ("brew install git") - A GitHub <https://github.com> account - Your favorite Java editor (Eclipse, IntelliJ IDEA, Netbeans) - The Cloud Foundry CLI <https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cli/releases> - download the latest!
- A FREE account on Pivotal Web Services - create a 60-day trial with no credit card at https://run.pivotal.io
QUESTIONS? Contact Kim Marie Ruquet at kruquet@pivotal.io <mailto:kruquet@pivotal.io> or via cell at 631-388-0569 <tel:631-388-0569>.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
P.S. - Only a few spots remain! If you have a colleague interested in attending please forward on this link to the workshop details & registration.
